name: Cake Mania: To The Max!
summary: Flashback to the neon-soaked 80's and help a teenage Jill Evans™ find her true calling in Cake Mania®: To the Max!, the highly anticipated sixth chapter in one of the most popular time management series of all-time! Help Jill juggle the waves of demanding customers that line the Evans Bakery counters as she prepares for the biggest night in her young life! With all-new equipment upgrades, updated shop mechanics, and interior improvements designed to increase performance, you'll have Jill on the path to becoming a world-class baker in no time. Play through 100 action-packed levels in Cake Mania: To the Max!
